subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Mark Martin won his second straight pole, with a lap of 125.773 miles an hour at Bristol Motor Speedway, the first time in 20 years he has won consecutive poles.bristol.
snippet: Mark Martin won his second straight pole, with a lap of 125.773 miles an hour at Bristol Motor Speedway, the first time in 20 years he has won consecutive poles.bristol.
